subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Yi Jianlian, Milwaukee’s top draft pick, joined his new team for his first practice yesterday, but again dodged the question that has hounded him since he announced he was coming to the N.B.A. Yi’s birth certificate lists him as being born Oct. 27, 1987, which would make him 19, but he has long been rumored to be older. “I have no comment on that,” Yi said through an interpreter. Yi, a 6-foot-11 power forward, looked sluggish during practice, the Bucks’ fourth of training camp. He traveled Wednesday on a 15-hour flight from Shanghai to Chicago.
